Articles.Content:
Good day


I have a problem with the graphics resolution in KSP2.
As you can see in the following screenshot, at the edge of the screen is no longer a correct resolution of the sky (background).

https://imgur.com/a/xS4SOgN
My screen has an optimal resolution ovn 3840 x 1600. In KSP2 I have tested any graphics resolution, but I do not get an acceptable result.
Can you give me some help?


Best regards

 

Graphics card supplement.
My PC is equipped with an RTX2080S. Even when I play KSP2 in fixed mode (on a size defined by KSP2), I have the same problems.

Edited March 19, 2023 by Schidan90
supplement graphic
